Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using the Markdown format. 

[[
## Summary
]]


Status of Lighthouse beacon chain: 1/3 validators synced to block 4.
Lighthouse is still experiencing issues syncing from genesis.

Shasper testnet status:
- Shasper devnet has been deployed with a new fork choice rule and 
   improved difficulty adjustment algorithm.
- The team will continue testing the new rules on devnet before
   deploying them to mainnet.


The next CL/EL meeting is scheduled for 2023-02-15.
